Situation - The Center for Heritage and Renewal in Spirituality — a new center affiliated with Abilene Christian University — came to us for help developing a website. Their vision is to become the premier online destination to engage in dialogue about Christian heritage and spirituality, particularly among their students.

Action - We designed and developed an online web presence that achieved the ambitious vision - with great user interface and navigation, world-class content, and compelling visual elements. The site established the Center as the go-to stpo for expertise on Christian heritage and spirituality in Abilene Christian's faith community.

Result - The response has been overwhelmingly positive. John Weaver of CHARIS wrote to say, "the new website has been great — we have been able to better facilitate conversations around faith and history by providing access to more historical resources... Students have realized the omportance of religious past and the best possibilities for a future lived in God's will."
